name: Dancing with Anime Girls 2
description:
Did you ever want to dance together with cute anime girls?
Would you like to dance and laugh with your new virtual girlfriends?
Did you ever dream about dancing with hot girls in a tropical location?

Then this game is for you.
Here, you can enjoy the show or move your own body to the beat of the music!

Features:

  • Dance with many different anime girls
  • Several interesting dance locations
  • Countless cool and sexy dance moves
  • Amazing sweet background music
  • Perfect game for lonely hours or just to kill some time
  • Awesome game to keep you fit
  • Unlimited hours of dancing
  • Achievements
